thread.title: New England Patriots 34-28 Atlanta Falcons (OT): Brady win | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: New England Patriots 34-28 Atlanta Falcons (OT): Brady win | Daily Mail Online

author: Martin Samuel For Mailonline
title: New England Patriots 34-28 Atlanta Falcons (OT): Brady win | Daily Mail Online

organizations.name: daily mail online new england patriots

text: New England Patriots 34-28 Atlanta Falcons (OT): James White scores matchwinning touchdown in overtime of Super Bowl LI as Tom Brady wins fifth championship in historic comeback Devonta Freeman and Austin Hooper score touchdowns to put Atlanta 14-0 ahead in the second quarter Robert Alford scored the Falcons' third touchdown in the quarter after he picked Tom Brady's pass Tevin Coleman ran in Atlanta's fourth touchdown after the interval to put them 27-3 ahead However, New England battled back with touchdowns from James White and Danny Amendola New England levelled the scoreline with less than two minutes left in the fourth quarter through White Amendola's two-point conversion saw this Super Bowl encounter become the first ever to go into over-time
